alert.note: Alert for Clay; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 8:58PM CST until January 30 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle to very light freezing rain expected. * WHERE...In Arkansas, Clay and Greene Counties. In Missouri, Dunklin and Pemiscot Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Roads, especially elevated surfaces such as bridges and overpasses will likely become slick and hazardous. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
